Name: Romit Mewada
AboutMe:

I have started coding in 2008 in C#.net. Initially I was so interested in C#.net. I have developed many small window based applications. In 2010, I have started working objective-C because I felt itâ€™s a fast growing technology. Then I never look back. Till now I have developed more then 100 apps. In 2013, I have started doing freelancing. In these time i get chance to work in android & core PHP. Also I worked with people from different countries like US, Spain, Japan, Israel, UK. Right now, I am working with CodePix Inc. where I am responsible for start to end development process. We just completed android version & iOS is already launched.

Now I am looking for long-term contract or fulltime senior level position as iOS developer
